bureau.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an office or organization that collects or provides information
bureau.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a government department or a part of a government department in the US
bureau.translation[0].definitions[2].def: an office of a company or organization that has its main office somewhere else
bureau.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: the London bureau of the Washington Post
bureau.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a large desk or writing table
bureau.translation[0].definitions[4].def: a piece of furniture with several drawers, used to keep clothes in
bureau.translation[1].definitions[0].def: an office, organization, or department that collects or gives out information
bureau.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a government department or part of a government department
bureau.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: the Federal Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
bureau.translation[1].definitions[2].def: an office of a company or organization that is not its main office or base
bureau.translation[1].definitions[2].exa: The international environmental organization Greenpeace has established its own Moscow bureau.
